documents.document: Have a suspicion @fiannafailparty are with the silent majority on this. https://t.co/Ad7leWjOnA

@Richard_Schiff very true: there's an unwritten code of honour that seems gone. I blame Gingrich in '94 for politics of scorched earth.

@PaulAnthonyWard it is striking how rare it is to see a UK flag fly in the republic.

@DPJHodges Gordon refusing to attend an EU treaty signing, and turning up to sign it alone, walking past dirty dishes after banquet?
